text: @DruckerPhilip After a slow start (he was against NYC Mayor DeBlasio's suggestion citizens shelter in place) Andrew Cuomo is doing a better job with the Covid-19 crisis than his usual job performance. Pre-Covid he wanted to CUT Medicaid & hospital funding as well as education support. Cuomo...
